ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Normal will check the 'Switches to Check' until they are all set, then set 'Switch to Set' once and stop.
Continuous will continue checking even after the switches have been set, and if any of them are unset, this actor will *unset* 'Switch to Set'.

ParameterFields.Name: First Switch to Check
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The first switch index to check. The other switches it checks are after this one sequentially.
For example, if this is 5 and 'Num Switches to Check' is 3, it will check switches 5, 6, and 7.

ParameterFields.Name: Switch to Set
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The switch to be set once all the switches to check have been set.
